subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Wiesberger, ranked 70th in the world, shot a six-under-par 65 in the third round and was one stroke behind the leader, Rory McIlroy.
snippet: Wiesberger, ranked 70th in the world, shot a six-under-par 65 in the third round and was one stroke behind the leader, Rory McIlroy.
